Right before this error occurs, I get the following output. It seems like the checkpoint file is never created, and at some point a DataLossError is thrown. Any help is greatly appreciated!

No checkpoint file found. Waiting...
No checkpoint file found. Waiting...
No checkpoint file found. Waiting...
Waiting for a new checkpoint...

body:
Right before this error occurs, I get the following output. It seems like the checkpoint file is never created, and at some point a DataLossError is thrown. Any help is greatly appreciated!
```
No checkpoint file found. Waiting...
No checkpoint file found. Waiting...
No checkpoint file found. Waiting...
Waiting for a new checkpoint...
```
